resources.string: Failed to join the class, please try again.
Network error. Check your network connection and try again.
The number of teachers has reached the upper limit.
The number of students has reached the upper limit.
* This product is used only to demonstrate the basic features. The class duration lasts 30 minutes. Commercial use is not allowed.
When the class ends, the recording file will be transcoded. and the playback will be available in 20 minutes.
If the chat room is disabled, the chat room interface will not appear
If the IM module is reused, the IM channel of the host application is used.
The CDN mode has 2-5s delay and the low-latency mode has 1-2s delay
Support teacher to add live task
IM reuse status (take effect after restart):
